page.title: 05TOURISTS IN THE FOREST
page.content: High Beech is the main tourist spot . This is the area attracting the most problems. One of these being litter . Horse riding ,has been a problem causing swampy ground in winter and a dirt track in summer but now eighteen and a half miles of horse ride have been laid ,costing twenty two thousand pounds things have been made better . High Beech is a meeting place for motorcycle enthusiasts on Sunday afternoons and has conflicted with the traditional family picnic spot.The main concern is the speed of bikes along forest roads,noise and wheel damage to tracks.
